subject: Learning
title: The Role of Autonomy in Learning
description: A fast breakdown of The Role of Autonomy in Learning for builders.

hook.text: Students who choose their essay topic write longer, more creative essays than those assigned a topic.

buildup.text: Autonomyâ€”feeling in control of your choicesâ€”is one of the most powerful drivers of motivation.

discovery.text: Even small choices matter. Choosing the order of problems or the color of a notebook increases engagement.

twist.text: Too much choice paralyzes. The 'paradox of choice' shows that unlimited options decrease motivation.

climax.text: The sweet spot: meaningful choices within a structured framework. Freedom with guidance.

punchline.text: Give people a choice, not infinite choices. Structure fuels freedom.

quiz.question: What is the paradox of choice?
options: Too many options can decrease motivation and satisfaction
People prefer having no choices at all
